title: Construction or reconstruction of slums/buildings falling under Reservations contemplated in the Dev
clause_text: Construction or reconstruction of slums/buildings falling under Reservations contemplated in the Development Plan shall be permissible as under –
section: (I) Development of reservation in Reconstruction or redevelopment of Cluster(s) of Buildings under Cluster Development Scheme(s)under Regulation No. 33(9):
